name: gumshield
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a device that people who take part in some sports put inside their mouths in order to protect their teeth and gums : Gumshields are an essential piece of protective gear for MMA, boxing and other combat sports. In rugby it makes sense to wear a gum shield.
iZhenya/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
More examplesFewer examplesGloves on and gumshield in, I jumped into the ring with a former army boxing champ for six minutes of pure hell.He spat out his gumshield the first time he was knocked down, forcing the referee to order cornermen to clean it before replacing it.School sports, which once required nothing more from participants than plimsolls and enthusiasm, can now only be undertaken by children wearing gum shields, scrum caps, and shin guards.
